name: Tesco Boneless Cod Fillets
description: Cod fillets with flaky chunks of moist white fish. Responsibly sourced mainly
from the North East Atlantic waters around Iceland, and the Barents sea, north
of Norway. Serve with root vegetable gratin, or for a fresh take on fish try
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="350°F" G="Gas 4" C="180°C" /><Time>15-20 minutes</Time><Instructions>Remove all packaging.Place on a baking tray wrapped in lightly oiled foil to form a loose parcel, in the centre of a pre-heated oven at 180°C/150°C Fan°F/Gas Mark 4 for 15-20 minutes.</Instructions></Oven><Microwave><Item23 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave><Barbeque /><Grill /><Shallow_Fry /><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen><Item24 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave_From_Frozen><Cooking_Precautions>All appliances vary these are guidelines only.Check food is piping hot throughout before serving.Not suitable for cooking from frozen.</Cooking_Precautions></Cooking_Instructions><Freezing_Instructions><Freezing_Guidelines>Suitable for home freezing. Freeze on day of purchase. Use within one month.</Freezing_Guidelines><Defrosting>Defrost thoroughly for a minimum of 10 hours in the refrigerator.IMPORTANT: If food has thawed, do not refreeze.Follow the preparation guidelines above.</Defrosting></Freezing_Instructions>
PromotionDescription: 50 extra points on any Tesco Finest meat or fish
